snippet.title: Ruya - Android Launch Trailer - 11th March 2018
snippet.description:
Ruya is now available on the Google Play Store, happy mothers day. :)

Google Play Store: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.miracleteastudios.ruya
Apple App Store: https://itunes.apple.com/gb/app/ruya/id1221679100?mt=8

ruyagame.com
